nodes.text: The Ywllandr system was a star system located within the Prefsbelt sector of the Outer Rim Territories.
It was used as a chokepoint by the Confederacy of Independent Systems during the latter stages of the Clone Wars.
A battle occurred here during the Outer Rim Sieges, during which Plo Koon led a Republic Navy strike force against the Separatists from aboard the Courageous.
